titleStmt.title: The country farmer a song / set by Mr. Jeremiah Clark.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Jeremiah, 1669?-1707.

titleStmt.title: The country farmer a song / set by Mr. Jeremiah Clark.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Jeremiah, 1669?-1707.
D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Lyrics attributed by Wing to D'Urfey.
First staff reads: Hark the cock crow'd, tis day all abroad, and looks like a jolly fair morning.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
